Messages.Win up to 50 Free spins in the Seduction: it_Win up to 50 Free spins in the Seduction Battle

Messages.Choose between two modes\nBlood Queen fo:
it_Choose between two modes
Blood Queen for Shifting Expanding Wilds & Van Hell for Sticky Spreading Wilds.

Messages.Choose between Van Hell and the Blood Qu: IT_Choose between Van Hell and the Blood Queen

Messages.You win by matching symbols on win lines: it_You win by matching symbols on win lines. All symbols must be matched on consecutive reels from left to right. Only the highest win on each line will be paid. Malfunction voids all pays and plays. See game rules for more details.

Messages.The wild appears on any top position of: it_The wild appears on any top position of the reels and expands to cover the entire reel.

Messages.It completes and substitutes all the ico: it_It completes and substitutes all the icons except for free spin.

Messages.More than 1 wild can appear at the same: it_More than 1 wild can appear at the same time.

Messages.Free spin symbols can appear on any posi: it_Free spin symbols can appear on any position on the reels.

Messages.Van Hell&#39;s Holy Water expanding stic: it_Van Hell's Holy Water expanding sticky wild

Messages.Depending on the initial Free spin game: it_Depending on the initial Free spin game selection, (Van Hell or blood queen) two different Wild symbols might be displayed during the free spin game.

Messages.The holy water symbol activates the stic: it_The holy water symbol activates the sticky wild spreading animation.

Messages.Each spin, the number of sticky wilds wi: it_Each spin, the number of sticky wilds will double, up to four.

Messages.Spreading animation starts vertically an: it_Spreading animation starts vertically and moves horizontally towards the center.

Messages.The blood potion wild icon appears on th: it_The blood potion wild icon appears on the third top central reel and expands covering the entire reel.

Messages.Each spin, the wild reel will shift left: it_Each spin, the wild reel will shift leftwards until it reaches the first reel.

Messages.More than one wild reel can be displayed: it_More than one wild reel can be displayed on the reels at the same time.
